TopicTitle: New install, KSP crashes during EVA

Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.25 Windows 64bit

Problem: Game crashed after looking around when EVA on the launchpad. Fresh new install with all mods supporting 0.25.

Mods installed:

[x] Science! v3.0

Toolbar 1.7.7

AutoAsparagus v0.7

Contracts Window + [v0.4]

Deadly Reentry v6.2.1

Kerbal Attachment System (KAS) 0.4.7

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement v2.4.4

KSP Alternate Resource Panel v2.5.2.0

MechJeb 0.25

PartCatalog 3.0 RC8

Procedural Dynamics - Procedural Wing 0.9.1

Procedural Fairings 3.10

Procedural Parts - Parts the way you want 'em 0.9.19

Wenkel Corporation - RealChute Parachute Systems v1.2.5.3

ScienceAlert 1.3

TAC Life Support v0.10.1

Kerbal Alarm Clock v2.7.9.0

TweakScale - Rescale Everything! (v1.44 - 2014-10-10 19:20 UTC)

ModuleManager.2.5.1

Reproduction steps:

Take first career pod and launch and go to the launch pad. EVA with Jeb in and out.

Log:

- https://www.dropbox.com/s/3kfv7ix02kkf5kb/crash.dmp?dl=0 - crash.dmp

- https://www.dropbox.com/s/vdlu4tri4971f48/error.log?dl=0 - error.log

- https://www.dropbox.com/s/14ldt5p9bqgfeud/output_log.txt?dl=0 - output_log.txt

- https://www.dropbox.com/s/3yf4x97qlfggf7r/report.ini?dl=0 - report.ini
Try updating Science Alert. The problems start just after that reloads, and version 1.3 is, uh..., rather old.
